body.p:
172
May 2d 4
M. H. Hardin Esq
Rock Bridge Ky.
Sir
Your letter of the 27th ult addressed to his Excellency the Governor has been referred to me for reply.
The 5th Ky cavalry was mustered into the U S Service on the 31s. day of March 1862, and as a regiment will be mustered out on the 31s of March 1865.

Very Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky.
